TallinnSec meetup vol. 5

The Dubliners - Sponsored by HackerOne

Posted on June 28, 2018

So, this was not just a regular meetup. Summertime brought on a little bit of a different kind of a meetup for us at the TallinnSec. This time, the event was hosted by the very very awesome, some drum roll here please … HackerOne!

It turned out we have become quite international, as we had people from all sides of the world: United States, Japan, Finland, Russia, Portugal and last but not least Estonia of course.

So cheered up as we are in HackerOne T-shirts, that’s us #togetherwehitharder.

Stay tuned for our next meetups on our website as well as on TallinnSec meetup page.
